newsitem.title: TUNISIA: TUNIS BOURSE INDEX CLOSES LOWER IN HIGHER TRADE.
newsitem.headline: TUNIS BOURSE INDEX CLOSES LOWER IN HIGHER TRADE.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Thursday fell by 0.46 percent in higher trade boosted by news that Banque Nationale Agricole was to recover a 980 million dinars bad debt owed to it by state bodies, bourse sources said.
The market's 30-share index closed at 556.18 from 558.77 on Wednesday.
Trade volume was 1.88 million dinars against 1.04 million dinars.
The main operation on the primary market was on Banque Nationale Agricole with 30,619 shares changing hands at an unchanged price of 33.8 dinars.
BIAT bank eased 1.04 dinar to 33.96 dinars. ($=one dinar)
